## megalearner 

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

 **megalearner** is an `R` package that implements the method in the paper Gonzalez Ginestet, P. et al. (2021). "Survival stacking with multiple data types using pseudo-observation-based-AUC loss".

## Organization of folders

## Installation

You can install the development version of `megalearner` from GitHub with:

``` r
if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("pablogonzalezginestet/megalearner")

```
